channel.title: Interventions on ASRG
channel.description: Recent content in Interventions on ASRG

item.title: Technopolitics of Fronts
item.description: Technopolitics of Fronts A broad-based intervention for the militant emancipatory defence of the need for community constraint of harmful algorithmic systems and their surrounding political projects, through the mechanism of the communitarian assembly, a bottom-up, horizontal structure that functions as a means to unite the spaces of technical concern and collective action. Posted: Jul 17, 2024. Modified: Aug 14, 2024 Graphic: © Algorithmic Sabotage Research Group | The typeface used is Avara from Velvetyne Foundry: https://velvetyne.

item.title: Police Officers Faces (POF)
item.description: Police Officers Faces (POF) This is a large-scale face recognition dataset comprising approximately 90,000 headshot photographs of thousands of police officers. It is intended as a tool to empower community members engaged in copwatch and other counter-surveillance practices. Posted: Jun 17, 2024. Modified: Aug 20, 2024 The above .GIF file contains one hundred sample images from the “Police Officers Faces (POF)” face recognition dataset. To protect the privacy of the individuals depicted, the faces have been redacted.
